sources.title: Rogues Regiment (1948)
sources.description: Dick Powell, Märta Toren, Vincent Price Directed by Robert Florey

metadata.Plot: After World War II, ex-soldiers trickle into French Saigon to join the Foreign Legion, among them American Whit Corbett and German Carl Reicher. Is Reicher really SS war criminal Martin Bruner, and is Corbett after him? Art dealer Van Ratten and nightclub chanteuse Lili Maubert are also more than they seem. Action scenes include anti-guerilla jungle warfare.
metadata.Actors: Dick Powell, Märta Torén, Vincent Price
